overview: Benjamin "Benji" Davis, a 29-year-old transgender man from Arkansas, has wanted to move to Colorado for years. Since coming out as trans in his 20s, Benji has found acceptance in unexpected places, both in the military and with his traditional, small-town Arkansas father. Benji hopes that moving to Colorado will be a fresh start for him, a place where he can be safe and free, where he can be "Just Benjamin".
title: Just Benjamin
